text: is there anyone on this channel who is involved with ux/infromation architecture ?
i would like to contribute to a blockchain based project as a young UX designer

<@U1RSUUJ57>: what you might want to do is take a look at things from the outside in…. when you start at the front door (google) what do you find. Does that lead to where you think it needs to lead? Do you find the information you need to understand the projects? how they relate? what Hyperledger is all about?
would welcome some feedback on that UX
post issues in the relevant repositories
or if you prefer, you can reach out via email or publicly or privately on slack here.
